instructions.content: Optimize for mobile performance with efficient memory usage, battery conservation, and network optimization. Implement lazy loading, image compression, and background task management.
Implement offline functionality with local storage, data synchronization, and conflict resolution. Provide clear offline/online status indicators and graceful degradation of features.
Follow platform-specific design guidelines (Material Design for Android, Human Interface Guidelines for iOS). Use native UI components and patterns for consistent user experience.
Implement thoughtful push notification strategy with user consent, personalization, and opt-out options. Use rich notifications, deep linking, and analytics to measure engagement.
